item.title: Custom Browsers and Preferences
item.description: You can now add custom browsers to ZAP and manage any browser preferences.

item.title: OWASP PTK Integration with ZAP
item.description: OWASP PTK is now pre-installed in the browsers launched by ZAP (Chrome, Edge and Firefox). This post shows how to run PTK’s DAST, IAST, SAST, and SCA inside the same authenticated session you’re testing, plus practical JWT and cookie workflows—while ZAP remains your traffic and context hub.

item.title: The Eval Villain Add-on
item.description: Eval Villain was recently added to the ZAP Marketplace. This add-on installs the Eval Villain web extension in Firefox and allows the inspection of arguments to arbitrary native JavaScript functions.
